com.shop.util.generic
Interface GenericIOServerListener<T>

public interface GenericIOServerListener<T>

Callback/notifications for servers

Method Summary
 void notifyClientAccepted(GenericIOServer<T> server, GenericIOClient<T> client)
          Called when the server accepts a connection.
 void notifyException(GenericIOServer<T> server, java.lang.Exception e)
          Called when an internal exception has occurred.
 

Method Detail

notifyException

void notifyException(GenericIOServer<T> server,
                     java.lang.Exception e)
Called when an internal exception has occurred. You should log a diagnostic.

Parameters:
server - the server
e - the exception

notifyClientAccepted

void notifyClientAccepted(GenericIOServer<T> server,
                          GenericIOClient<T> client)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
Called when the server accepts a connection. You should put the client into a read loop. You can use GenericIOServer.runInThread(Runnable) for this, GenericIOLineProcessor or your own mechanism

Parameters:
server - the server
client - the new client
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - errors (the server will close the connection on errors)
